channel.title: Blakescape editing
channel.description:
hiya all, this is my first post on this forum, and i hope its usefull.
much ppl got servers on this forum posted and on other forums that seems to be nice. i downloaded blakescape a while ago. its an empty world with only buildings, not working doors, not working skills etc. u can only walk and burry bones. (think thats all).
the download links are: http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/20051104-server.rar http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/rsprivservclient.rar
can someone explain to me how to edit them or how to let it see files i "stole" from other private servers? (and dont say copy client.java or copy, paste, compile cuz i already done that).
i know it can because i had/have cheezscape, originally from blakescape, testscape, originally from cheezscape, and liamscape, originally from testscape.
or if you got an program to do stuff like letting things work and such, can u post download link?
to make it easy i shall put it in a list for you guys: 1. i want NPC's 2. i want working doors 3. i want shops (i have an shop editor) 4. i want some sort of update IF its possible, (for Gswords, newer armour (like guthix robe top en whole set). 5. (ses something about nr 4.) i wanna keep old graphics (i dont care if fala gets white) 6. it must have working spells, bows, poison etc. 7. i wanna have working other skills (if possible all old skills) i think thats all. and i do wanna make my own server of it, not just download an server someone else fully made. if u can post other blank or almost blank easy to edit servers please post a link with the following things:
- Source (the server itself i think) - The Client (the runner i think) - the version (if its 508 or 525 or 377 or whatever) - if it can local host - if it has ::pickup command (i love it, thats why i want it in) - the rules i have posted what i wanna know how to edit.
i hope someone can help me making it.
if u can....
already
THNX

item.title: Blakescape editing
item.dc:creator: @vayle vayle
item.description:
@vayle wrote:

xweetok599:

To start a private server, you at least need to know a little bit about java. And you server already knows that files.

maybe you should download it and try to find it, there is no one in it, and when i add it and compile it doesn’t see them, as i sed, blakescape is an empty source, like an sandbox,

Read full topic

item.title: Blakescape editing
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

To start a private server, you at least need to know a little bit about java. And you server already knows that files.

Read full topic

item.title: Blakescape editing
item.dc:creator: @vayle vayle
item.description:
@vayle wrote:

its not about how to do java, its just about how to let my server know the file autospawn.cfg, items.cfg and such.

or i just need an blank version of an working client+source(!) that i can edit and works.

and i’m getting quite familiar to javascript btw, and much can be found at the internet

but every forum gets posts like this. so i thought lets open one myself. so i’m asking if someone can post:

  • how to let my server know this things
  • programs that might help me with it
  • an (newer) blank server that might me easyer to edit.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

O wAt The Fuck I think U Can Code In Php Too

thats the norm for mmorpgs. I know mw2 is in php as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Blakescape editing
item.dc:creator: @vayle vayle
item.description:
@vayle wrote:

hiya all, this is my first post on this forum, and i hope its usefull.

much ppl got servers on this forum posted and on other forums that seems to be nice. i downloaded blakescape a while ago. its an empty world with only buildings, not working doors, not working skills etc. u can only walk and burry bones. (think thats all).

the download links are:
http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/20051104-server.rar
http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/rsprivservclient.rar

can someone explain to me how to edit them or how to let it see files i “stole” from other private servers? (and dont say copy client.java or copy, paste, compile cuz i already done that).

i know it can because i had/have cheezscape, originally from blakescape, testscape, originally from cheezscape, and liamscape, originally from testscape.

or if you got an program to do stuff like letting things work and such, can u post download link?

to make it easy i shall put it in a list for you guys:

  1. i want NPC’s
  2. i want working doors
  3. i want shops (i have an shop editor)
  4. i want some sort of update IF its possible, (for Gswords, newer armour (like guthix robe top en whole set).
  5. (ses something about nr 4.) i wanna keep old graphics (i dont care if fala gets white)
  6. it must have working spells, bows, poison etc.
  7. i wanna have working other skills (if possible all old skills)
    i think thats all. and i do wanna make my own server of it, not just download an server someone else fully made. if u can post other blank or almost blank easy to edit servers please post a link with the following things:
  • Source (the server itself i think)
  • The Client (the runner i think)
  • the version (if its 508 or 525 or 377 or whatever)
  • if it can local host
  • if it has ::pickup command (i love it, thats why i want it in)
  • the rules i have posted what i wanna know how to edit.

i hope someone can help me making it.

if u can…

already

THNX

Read full topic
